name: From TV Animation Slam Dunk: Yonkyou Gekitotsu!!
summary: Basketball video game developed by TOSE and published by Bandai for the Super Famicom in 1994. First game of the "Slam Dunk" franchise.

alternative_names.name: From TV Animation Slam Dunk: Shikyou Gekitotsu!!
From TV Animation: Slam Dunk: Dream Team Shueisha Limited
